Name: Lucia: Lotus
Desc: Draw 1 <Icon=IconRedSkill|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>Red Orb Card</color> after any 3-Ping. Lotus gains <Icon=IconDualBlades|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>[Dual Blades]</color>. If Lotus already has <Icon=IconDualBlades|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>[Dual Blades]</color>, then gain 1 Action Point instead.\n<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>- [Dual Blades]: Lasts 1 turn. After dealing DMG, deals the same amount of DMG again.</color></size>
RedBallDesc: Deal <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>4</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>6</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>8</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draw 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.

Name: Liv: Eclipse
Desc: Draw 1 <Icon=IconBlueSkill|45|45|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>Blue Orb Card</color> after any 3-Ping and take the top 1 card of the pile. If the card value is lower than the commandant's remaining HP, deal <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>6</color> to all enemies.
QteDesc: The commandant restores <Icon=IconHeal|25|25|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>2</color> and draws 1 card.

Name: Bianca: Zero
Desc: After any 3-Ping, Zero gains <Icon=IconMercy|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>[Mercy]</color> of stacks equal to maximum number of same-valued cards pinged. \n<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>- [Mercy]: Can be stacked. Max 3 stacks. Each stack increases the DMG dealt by 1. At 3 stacks, moves Zero's Signature Card from the draw pile or discard pile to the top of the pile.</color></size>
RedBallDesc: Deal <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>4</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>6</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>8</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draw 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.

Name: Hanying: Zitherwoe
Desc: After any 3-Ping, Zitherwoe gains <Icon=IconDance|45|45|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>[Dance]</color> of stacks equal to maximum number of same-valued cards pinged. Then, take the rightmost card in your hand and put it next to the card of the same color on the left. \n<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>-[Dance]: Can be stacked. Max 3 stacks. At 3 stacks, moves Zitherwoe's Signature Card from the draw pile or discard pile to the top of the pile.</color></size>
QteDesc: The commandant restores <Icon=IconHeal|25|25|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>2</color> and draws 1 card.

BlueBallDesc: The commandant restores <Icon=IconHeal|25|25|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>1</color>/ <Icon=IconHeal|25|25|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>2</color>/ <Icon=IconHeal|25|25|0.5/> <color=#59CCFFFF>2</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draws 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.

Name: Rosetta: Rigor
Desc:
After any 3-Ping, cause one of the following effects based on the maximum number of same-value cards pinged:
1 Card: Gain <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>6</color>.
2 Cards: Gain <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>6</color> and inflict <color=#FAD364FF>[Frail] x2</color> on the target enemy.
3 Cards: Gain <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>9</color> and inflict <color=#FAD364FF>[Frail] x6</color> on the target enemy.
<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>- [Frail]: Takes 50% more DMG. Removes 1 stack every after receiving DMG.</color></size>
QteDesc: The commandant gains <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>4</color> and draws 1 card.
RedBallDesc: Deal <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>4</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>6</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>8</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draw 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.
BlueBallDesc: The commandant gains <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>3</color>/ <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>4</color>/ <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>6</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draws 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.
YellowBallDesc: The commandant gains <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>3</color>/ <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>4</color>/ <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>6</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draws 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.

Name: Luna: Laurel
Desc: After any 3-Ping, Laurel gains <Icon=IconSingularity|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>[Singularity]</color> x2. After discarding any card(s), Laurel will get <Icon=IconAnnihilation|45|45|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>[Annihilation]</color> equal to the total value of the card(s) discarded.\n<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>- [Singularity]: Can be stacked. Max 4 stacks. If Laurel is already switched in when the turn begins, discard X lowest card(s), draw X card(s) (X equals to Laurel's [Singularity] stack(s)), and remove all [Singularity] stack(s).\n- [Annihilation]: Can be stacked. Max 999 stacks.</color></size>
RedBallDesc: Deal <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>4</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>6</color>/ <Icon=IconAttack|25|25|0.5/> <color=#E76D88>8</color> based on the number of orbs pinged. Draw 1 card if it is a 3-Ping.

When any character is switched in, triggers Capriccio's QTE effects. Removes 1 stack when triggered.</color></size>

Name: Karenina: Scire
Desc: When switched in through QTE, arranges your hand once and then repeats the following action up to 3 times.\nDiscards 1 random set of 3-Ping and gains <Icon=IconArmor|25|25|0.5/> <color=#FAD364FF>6</color> and 3 <color=#FAD364FF>[Leap Attack]</color> Cards.\n<size=24><color=#FFFFFF2D>- [Leap Attack] Card:<Icon=IconSpade|24|24/> K Card.
